name: PodFast
description: PodFast uses AI to distill long-form podcasts into audio/visual animated summaries. It is a live and working product already serving the public on all major social platforms. PodFast is founded by Jeff Kirdeikis, the CEO of TrustSwap. The $FAST token grants access to the in-app pro mode, exclusive content, and token reflections where every onchain tx has 0.75% distributed to holders PodFast will also feature an in-browser extension for Youtube that summarizes any youtube video into 10 key points and takeaways, including timestamps.
